TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DebuggerDisplayAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DebuggerDisplayAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DebuggerDisplayAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=true)

summary.span: 決定類別或欄位在偵錯工具變數視窗中顯示的方式。

span.span: Determines how a class or field is displayed in the debugger variable windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式有單一引數：在類型執行個體的 [值] 一欄中顯示的字串。The constructor has a single argument: a string to be displayed in the value column for instances of the type. 這個字串可以包含括弧 ({ 和 })。This string can contain braces ({ and }). 一對括號內的文字會評估為欄位、 屬性或方法的名稱。The text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會在選取加號 (+) 時顯示 "Count = 4"，展開偵錯工具顯示的 `MyHashtable` 執行個體。For example, the following C# code causes "Count = 4" to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyHashtable`. ```csharp [DebuggerDisplay("Count = {count}")] class MyHashtable { public int count = 4; } ``` 使用 Visual Studio 中的這個屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用 DebuggerDisplay 屬性](/visualstudio/debugger/using-the-debuggerdisplay-attribute)。For information about using this attribute in Visual Studio, see [Using the DebuggerDisplay Attribute](/visualstudio/debugger/using-the-debuggerdisplay-attribute). ## Examples 若要查看套用結果的 Visual Studio 中檢視下列範例。View the following example in Visual Studio to see the results of applying the . [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

param.name: value
param.span: 要顯示在型別執行個體之值資料行中的字串；空字串 ("") 會讓值資料行變成隱藏的資料行。

span.span: The string to be displayed in the value column for instances of the type; an empty string ("") causes the value column to be hidden.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`參數可以包含括號 （{和}）。The `value` parameter can contain braces ({ and }). 一對括號內的文字會評估為欄位、 屬性或方法的名稱。The text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. 例如，下列 C# 程式碼會在選取加號 (+) 時顯示 "Count = 4"，展開偵錯工具顯示的 `MyTable` 執行個體。For example, the following C# code causes "Count = 4" to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyTable`. ```csharp [DebuggerDisplay("Count = {count}")] class MyTable { public int count = 4; } ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會導致值屬性從繼承選取加號 （+） 以展開偵錯工具顯示之執行個體時所要顯示的類別`MyHashtable`。The following code example causes the value of the property from the inherited class to be displayed when the plus sign (+) is selected to expand the debugger display for an instance of `MyHashtable`. 您必須執行完整的範例中會提供類別，以查看結果。You must run the complete example, which is provided in the class, to see the results. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示於偵錯工具變數視窗中的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name to display in the debugger variable windows.

value.span: 要顯示在偵錯工具變數視窗中的名稱。

span.span: The name to display in the debugger variable windows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值只能包含大括號 （{和}）。The value can contain curly braces ({ and }). 一對括號內的文字會評估為欄位、 屬性或方法的名稱。Text within a pair of braces is evaluated as the name of a field, property, or method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會造成的名稱和每個索引鍵在偵錯工具變數視窗中顯示的值。The following code example causes the name and value of each key to be displayed in the debugger variable windows. 不套用屬性時，會顯示索引和值類型 (例如:"[0] {KeyValuePairs}")。When the attribute is not applied, the index and value type are displayed (for example: "[0] {KeyValuePairs}"). 套用屬性時，會顯示索引鍵和其值的名稱 (例如，如果第一個索引鍵是 「 一 」，而其值為 1，顯示為:"一個 1 」)。When the attribute is applied, the name of the key and its value are displayed (for example, if the first key is "one" and its value is 1, the display is: "one 1"). 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/cpp/program.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/CS/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.DebuggerBrowsableAttribute/VB/module1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定屬性 (Attribute) 的目標型別。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of the attribute's target.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性時使用組件層級的屬性，指定目標類型。Use this property to specify the target type when the attribute is used at the assembly level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性時使用組件層級的屬性，指定目標類型的名稱。Use this property to specify the name of the target type when the attribute is used at the assembly level.

summary.span: 取得要在偵錯工具變數視窗之值資料行中顯示的字串。

span.span: Gets the string to display in the value column of the debugger variable windows.

value.span: 要在偵錯工具變數視窗之值資料行中顯示的字串。

span.span: The string to display in the value column of the debugger variable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性包含傳入的字串`value`參數的建構函式。This property contains the string passed in by the `value` parameter of the constructor.
